main event: A white object resembling a star was observed rising at 130 degrees for 40 seconds, flashing and bursting apart with large lights.
interesting points: The sighting attracted 17,000 spectators, The object was visible on a clear night with bright stars, Observations suggested it might be the last stage of a satellite booster, The object distorted like an illuminating object and was considered not to be a meteorite, The event lasted for about 40 seconds.
sighted object: one white object like a star
witness description: spectators at Westover AFB during the sighting
